description: Apple’s Mac Mini with the M4 chip, launched in India in October 2024, is now available at its lowest-ever price. The base model features 16GB RAM and 256GB SSD, upgradable to 24GB RAM and 512GB storage. Powered by Apple’s 3nm processor with 10 CPU and GPU cores and a 16-core Neural Engine, it supports up to three external displays. Amazon’s Great Indian Festival offers it at Rs. 47,999 with eligible credit card discounts.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Mac Mini (2024) Price Drops to an All-Time Low in India

description: The launch of the Xiaomi 17 series will reportedly take place on September 30. Xiaomi is currently taking pre-orders for the phones in China. They will come with Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset. The company has started teasing the smartphones through Weibo. The Pro models are already confirmed to come with the "Magic Back Screen" feature.
title: Xiaomi 17 Series Tipped to Launch on September 30

description: iPhone 18 Pro and iPhone 18 Pro Max are expected to go official next year. Early rumours suggest that they will retain the design of iPhone 17 Pro models. They are expected to come with a "slightly transparent design" on the rear panel. They could feature a stainless-steel vapour chamber cooling system. The iPhone 18 Pro and iPhone 18 Pro Max are said to have 6.3-inch and 6.9-inch display sizes, respectively.
title: iPhone 18 Pro Models Tipped to Retain iPhone 17 Pro Design, Could Feature Transparent Back

description: Vivo and iQOO smartphones in India may soon transition from Funtouch OS to Origin OS, according to recent leaks, though no official confirmation has been made. A Reddit user claiming to be a Vivo India employee suggested Origin OS 6, based on Android 16, could roll out in India, beginning with flagship models before expanding to mid-range and budget devices. Meanwhile, Vivo has officially announced that Android 16-based Origin OS 6 will debut in China on October 10.
title: Vivo, iQOO Smartphones Likely to Switch to Origin OS in India, Replacing Funtouch OS

description: Instamart’s Quick India Movement 2025 sale is running on the Swiggy and Instamart apps until September 28, featuring discounts of 50 to 90 percent and 10-minute deliveries. Golden Hour offers include the OnePlus 13R at Rs. 38,999 and Hammer AirFlow earbuds at Rs. 349, with additional hourly price drops. Other major deals cover the OnePlus Nord CE4 Lite at Rs. 16,999, Oppo K13x 5G at Rs. 12,499, Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3 at Rs. 48,999, and JBL Flip 5 for Rs. 4,999. Extra savings will be available through bank cards and wallets.
title: Instamart Quick India Movement Sale 2025 Goes Live: Best Offers on Smartphones, Smartwatches and More

description: Samsung Galaxy A17 4G launched in Germany. It has a 6.7-inch display with a 90Hz refresh rate and has a triple rear camera unit headlined by a 50-megapixel primary camera. It features a 13-megapixel front-facing camera. The phone features a 5,000mAh battery and IP54 rated build.
title: Samsung Galaxy A17 4G Launched With MediaTek Helio G99 SoC, 5,000mAh Battery: Price, Specifications

description: Tencent has finally responded to Sony's copyright infringement lawsuit against its upcoming survival game, Light of Motiram. The Chinese conglomerate said Sony was attempting to "monopolise" popular genre conventions seen in other games with its lawsuit and sought the dismissal of the case on legal grounds.
title: Tencent Says Sony 'Monopolising' Genre Conventions, Seeks Dismissal of Light of Motiram Lawsuit

description: Amazon’s Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 begins September 22 for Prime members and September 23 for all users. Billed as the company’s biggest India sale, it will feature discounts across smartphones, wearables, laptops, tablets, and home appliances. Shoppers seeking new smart TVs can also expect deals from brands like Samsung, Hisense, TCL, Acer, and more.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Best Smart TV Deals Revealed With Prices Starting at Rs. 13,499

description: Amazon’s Great Indian Festival 2025 Sale begins September 22 for Prime members and September 23 for all users. The event brings offers on PC accessories from brands like Logitech, Dell, HP, and Arctic Fox, making it a good time to upgrade peripherals. Discounts will also extend across smartphones, laptops, wearables, gaming consoles, smart TVs, and home appliances.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Top Deals on Logitech, Dell, HP, and More PC Accessories

description: The iPhone 17 series, iPhone Air, Apple Watch Series 11, and AirPods Pro 3 are now available for purchase globally, including in India, following their debut at the ‘Awe Dropping’ event on September 9. Early reviews of the new devices have started surfacing, highlighting some notable issues. One such problem is a camera bug affecting the iPhone Air and iPhone 17 Pro, where black boxes appear in photos. Apple is reportedly working on a software fix.
title: Apple to Reportedly Roll Out Update Addressing Camera Bugs on iPhone Air and iPhone 17 Pro

description: The Australian Securities and Investments Commission (ASIC) has introduced class relief that exempts intermediaries from needing separate licences to distribute stablecoins issued by licensed providers. The initiative is intended to lower compliance hurdles and encourage growth in the digital assets sector. At the same time, ASIC emphasised that issuers must continue to hold an Australian financial services licence, ensuring that regulatory oversight and consumer protections remain intact even as innovation in payments and digital assets accelerates.
title: Australia’s ASIC Grants Exemptions to Stablecoin Intermediaries

description: Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale will be live on Flipkart Minutes from day one. The sale will start on September 22 for Plus and Black members. All shoppers can access the sale from September 23. The instant delivery platform will provide 10-minute doorstep delivery of items starting at midnight. The service will be available across 19 cities and 3,000 pin codes.
title: Big Billion Days Sale: Flipkart Minutes Promises Doorstep Delivery of iPhone 17, Galaxy S24 in 10 Minutes

description: Bitcoin traded near $116,900 (roughly Rs. 1.03 crore) on Friday, while Ethereum stood at $4,500 (roughly Rs. 3.99 lakh). Altcoins, including XRP, BNB, Solana, and Dogecoin, showed resilience as markets absorbed the Fed’s rate cut. Analysts point to ETF flows, whale accumulation, and broader institutional interest as key drivers supporting market momentum ahead of fresh macroeconomic cues.
title: Bitcoin Stabilises Near $116,900 as Altcoins Push Higher

description: Google is said to be working on a smart speaker. A new string of codes reportedly found in Google's latest Google Home app suggests that the company might launch it with the name 'Google Home Speaker'. It could come with 360-degree audio support. The APK teardown of version 3.41 of the app also suggests the rebranding of Nest Aware to “Google Home Premium.”
title: Google’s Upcoming Smart Speaker Could Be Named 'Google Home Speaker'

description: Mahavatar Narsimha is a mythological movie that made a sensation post-theatrical release. It has now landed on your digital screens. Watch now.
title: Mahavatar Narsimha Now Streaming on Netflix: Everything You Need to Know About This Animated Mythological Drama

description: Nintendo confirmed in a YouTube trailer that Klonoa: Empire of Dreams and Mr. Driller 2 were joining the Game Boy Advance – Nintendo Classics collection, available via the Nintendo Switch Online + Expansion Pack on Switch and Switch 2. Klonoa: Empire of Dreams is a spin-off of Namco’s early 2000s PlayStation 2.5D platformers, faithfully replicating the console experience. Mr. Driller 2 is a port of a classic Namco arcade game, a spiritual successor to Dig Dug.
title: Nintendo Switch Online Adds First Third-Party Game Boy Advance Titles from Namco This September

description: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra was launched in January 2024 by the South Korean tech giant as its flagship handset, while the Galaxy S25 Plus debuted in January 2025. Both the Galaxy S-series handsets will be available at unbelievable prices during the upcoming festive sales on Amazon, Flipkart, and Samsung’s official website.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Plus vs Galaxy S24 Ultra: Which is a Better Deal This Festive Sale

description: Google may replace its Nest Aware subscription with a new plan called Google Home Premium, according to an APK teardown of the latest Google Home app. The service could add Gemini-powered AI features, such as recognising familiar faces, object and pet detection, and detailed event summaries. An advanced tier may replace Nest Aware Plus, with possible Google One bundling.
title: Google Home Premium Subscription Could Reportedly Replace Nest Aware, Introduce AI Features

description: Google has begun rolling out Gemini in Chrome, the California-based tech giant said in a blog post on Thursday. This brings new artificial intelligence (AI)-powered features to the Chrome browser, which is claimed to enhance user experience. The company is currently rolling out the Gemini in Chrome upgrade to all macOS and Chrome users in the US who have set their language to English. Moreover, the Gemini in Chrome is also being rolled out to mobile users in the US.
title: Google Rolls Out Gemini in Chrome Browser to Introduce AI Agentic Capabilities, Safety Features For Users

description: On Amazon, shoppers will be able to purchase the iPhone 15 for below Rs. 45,000. Meanwhile, Flipkart will offer the iPhone 16 at Rs. 51,999. Both handsets come with an interesting set of features and specifications. With the iPhone 16 and iPhone 15 being so close in terms of pricing, which one should you go for?
title: iPhone 16 at Rs. 52,000 vs iPhone 15 at Rs. 45,000: Which is the Smarter Buy?

description: iQOO 15 is likely to be launched in China next month. Pre-reservations for the smartphone have commenced ahead of its anticipated debut next month. The company has also shared details about its design. It is teased to come with a circular camera island at the back, illuminated by RGB lights. We can also see the right side of the handset’s frame and a single button with chiselled edges.
title: iQOO 15 Design Teased, Pre-Reservation Begins Ahead of China Launch in October

description: Nvidia has announced a $5 billion investment in Intel as part of a wider partnership to co-develop AI infrastructure and PC chipsets. The deal, subject to regulatory approval, will integrate Intel’s x86 CPUs with Nvidia’s RTX GPUs via NVLink. Both firms will also build custom CPUs and SoCs, aiming to strengthen Intel’s AI position amid market struggles.
title: Nvidia Invests $5 Billion in Intel, to Jointly Develop AI Infrastructure and PC Chips

description: Oppo Find X9 series, comprising the standard Find X9 and Find X9 Pro, is set to launch in China next month. Leaks regarding the lineup’s specifications and features have been surfacing online for a while. Recently, an Oppo executive confirmed that the upcoming Find X9 series will be powered by the flagship MediaTek Dimensity chipset. Now, the alleged renders of the standard model have leaked online, revealing the design of the phone.
title: Oppo Find X9 Renders Reveal Design, Dolby Vision Support Ahead of October Launch

description: The Redmi 15C 5G debuts with a 6.9-inch 120Hz Dot Drop display, MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset, and Android 15-based HyperOS 2. It offers 4GB RAM, 256GB storage, and a 6,000mAh battery with 33W fast charging. The phone sports a 50-megapixel dual rear camera, an 8-megapixel selfie camera, and includes 5G, Bluetooth 5.4, USB-C, and a 3.5mm jack support. With IP64 dust and splash-resistant build, TÜV-certified eye safety, and a side-mounted fingerprint sensor, it is priced in Poland from PLN 699 (roughly Rs. 17,000).
title: Redmi 15C 5G With 50-Megapixel Rear Camera, 6,000mAh Battery Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Vivo X300 series is expected to go official in China soon. Ahead of its debut, a company executive has revealed the design and colourways of the Vivo X300 and X300 Pro. Both handsets are confirmed to get a circular camera island and a left-aligned LED flash. The standard X300 will be available in blue and pink shades, while the Pro model may come in black and gold finishes.
title: Vivo X300, Vivo X300 Pro Design and Colourways Revealed Ahead of Launch in China

description: Xiaomi 17 series is confirmed to debut in China later this month. However, ahead of the launch date announcement, the Xiaomi 17, Xiaomi 17 Pro, and Xiaomi 17 Pro Max have been listed by the smartphone maker for pre-ordering in China. Confirmed to be powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, the Pro models in the lineup will feature a secondary display on the back, along with a Leica-branded triple rear camera unit.
title: Xiaomi 17 Series Pre-Orders Open in China: Specs and Everything We Know So Far

description: Xiaomi Pad 8 series is confirmed to launch later this month alongside the Xiaomi 17 series. The brand has shared the first official teaser of the tablets, revealing their design and a few key specifications. The series, which is expected to consist of Xiaomi Pad 8 and Pad 8 Pro, will have an 11.2-inch display and the HyperOS 3 interface based on Android 16. They will be launched with a detachable keyboard and a stylus.
title: Xiaomi Pad 8 Series Confirmed to Launch This Month Alongside Xiaomi 17; Pre-Reservations Begin

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025 will begin on September 23 in India. It is the e-commerce giant's biggest annual sale event, offering lucrative deals on a wide range of products across various categories. Smartphones, especially, are expected to be available at considerably lower prices than their usual market rates. From iPhone 15 to Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra, here are the biggest deals on smartphones you can find once the Amazon sale begins.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Biggest Offers on iPhone 15, Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra, OnePlus 13R, and More Revealed

description: The Skullcandy Sesh ANC Active earbuds arrive with an IP67-rated build, sporty design, and up to 48 hours of battery life, making them seem like an ideal fitness companion. The companion app adds useful EQ presets, customisation, and personal sound profiles, while the fast-charging support is handy for daily use. However, not everything lives up to the promise. Connectivity hiccups and certain performance aspects raise questions. At Rs. 8,800, the Sesh ANC Active may impress some users, but others might be left wanting more.
title: Skullcandy Sesh ANC Active Review: Well Built, But is That All?

description: UBON aims to grow online sales from 5 percent to 25 percent in the next 2 years, with a quick commerce push and exclusive online products. The company is also planning to solidify its position as the India's most trusted accessory brand. Gadgets360 got the chance to talk UBON's co-founder, Lalit Arora, to know about company's plan to establish itself in the Indian market
title: UBON Targets 25 Percent Online Business Share with Quick Commerce Push

description: Top streaming platforms are gearing up with some binge-worthy movies and web series where there’s romance, comedy, horror, action, and thrill. Know what’s buzzing this week.
title: OTT Releases This Week (Sept 15 - Sept 21): The Bads of Bollywood, Article 370, The Trial Season 2, Sinners, and More

description: iPhone 17 series, iPhone Air, and all other products that were announced on September 9 are now available for purchase in India. Customers can buy the Apple devices through its website, Apple Store app, leading e-commerce platforms, and offline retailers across the country. The tech giant offers an instant discount of up to Rs. 5,000 and no-cost EMI options on purchases.
title: iPhone 17 Series, iPhone Air, Apple Watch Series 11, AirPods Pro (3rd Generation) and More Go on Sale in India: See Price
